- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  byComposedCharacterSequences 

Type Property# byComposedCharacterSequences

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var byComposedCharacterSequences: NSString.EnumerationOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSString/EnumerationOptions/byComposedCharacterSequences#Discussion)

Enumerates by composed character sequences. Equivalent to [`rangeOfComposedCharacterSequences(for:)`](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/rangeofcomposedcharactersequences(for:)).
